content.stimulus_en: Nature is (beautiful) ________ than buildings.
The forest is (quiet) ________ than the street.
The city is (noisy) ________ than the country.
Is the Pacific (big) ________ than the Atlantic?
This mountain is (high) ________ than that one.
The Amazon is (long) ________ than the Nile.
The desert can be very dangerous.
It the is most beautiful landscape I have ever seen.
I love hiking in the mountains.
The is lake very peaceful in the morning.
The coast is much colder than the city center.
We many saw wild animals in the forest.
The past or related word for Río is '________'.
Lake
